3: Lucia begins to dive from the divergence point of the Deep M.I.N.D. she shares with Alpha.
Because of the constraints of the connecting bridge, everything she does here will affect Alpha.
I don't remember ever seeing this area. It seems like this is where my memory data has been sealed.
When Lucia reaches out her hand, she suddenly feels an invisible force trying to keep her away.
This is my memory. I can't back off now!
With the invisible force gone, the Deep M.I.N.D. starts vibrating.
Her surroundings begin to clarify, and images of her memories start showing.
